item.title: 化妆师唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）根据《外星敌人法》驱逐出境
与埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）作战，一次是特斯拉经销商
Instagrammer像詹姆斯·哈登（James Harden）一样漂浮并像沙克一样射击
李·凯拉（Li’l Kayla）忍受了一切
item.description: 2025-03-31T16：00：00.000Z <文章> Save this story 保存此故事 “Precious Rubbish,” a début graphic novel by Kayla E., a book designer turned cartoonist, delivers an unflinching look at the author’s coming-of-age in a rural fundamentalist community in Texas. “李·凯拉（Li’l Kayla）”，将自己的时间分开在疏远的父母之间，努力应对自己的身份和性行为。 由漫画，纸娃娃，活动和游戏页面，漫画书广告等组成href =“ https://www.amazon.com/precious-rubbish-kayla/dp/1683969286” rel =“ nofollow nooopener” target =“ _ blank”> precial垃圾“ ”干净的线条和原色，以二十月中旬的商业艺术为基础，引起 chris ware 和。内容在内容中同样多 - 幽默探索一个在残酷和冷漠世界中成长的敏感儿童的悲伤，就像它的形式一样。 Brunetti称赞Kayla E.的作品是“纯粹的韧性胜利 - 一种精神上的浓密，黑暗的个人痛苦，屈辱和痛苦的糖浆。这会让您不恰当地（和内guiilly）笑，这是我可以给出的最高称赞。” Kayla E.使用她的媒介来引人注目：她的肖像揭示了新鲜的眼睛，立刻脆弱且毫不畏惧。 在下面的摘录中，睁大眼睛的li'l kayla wanders在她的世界中徘徊，试图使她周围的功能障碍和blam bla 婴儿和漫画“ src =” https://media.newyorker.com/photos/67e2ec8cc19315bf75602676/master/master/w_1600%2cc_limit/precious_rubbish_rubbish_rubbish_4.jpg src =“ https://media.newyorker.com/photos/67e2ec17c21e66262ba11/master/master/w_1600%2cc_limit/precious_rubbish_7.jpg” 女儿。” src =“ https://media.newyorker.com/photos/67e2ec8e0c7a2807fd76a8ff/master/master/w_1600%2cc_limit/precious_rubbish_rubbish_9.jpg” 女孩。” src =“ https://media.newyorker.com/photos/67e2ec8e6beb09a8692358/master/master/w_1600%2cc_limit/precious_rubbish_rubbish_10.jpg” href =“ https://www.amazon.com/precious-rubbish-kayla/dp/1683969286” rel =“ nofollow nooplower” target =“ _ blank”> presential垃圾 。”

item.title: 琼·迪迪恩（Joan Didion）的治疗笔记
莱斯利·比布（Leslie Bibb）去靛蓝
为什么法院在学校种族隔离上刹车
Ayşegülavaş上读“马赛”
item.description: 2025-03-30T10：00：00.000Z 23.9508V2.95081H14V3.93211H6V22.1845L12.5 18.5536L19 22.1845V8.83866H20V23.9508Z 3H20V0H19V3H16V4H19V7H20V4H23V3Z">Save this story 保存此故事 href =“ https://pod.link/gezrw.apple?pdst_key = df1e65c3eb684bbabcda953605e811 EE＆amp; pdst_group = BF03B01BC33E42E3B6D991B4F18C7311＆amp; pdst_label = fgnrsklp“ rel =“ nofollow nooopener” target =“ _ blank”> apple | spotify | google | 无论您在哪里听 up Fiction newsletter.Ayşegül Savaş reads her story “Marseille,” from the April 7, 2025, issue of the magazine.萨瓦斯（Savaş href =“ https://www.amazon.com/white-novel-ayseg%c3%Bcl-savas/dp/0593333051x” rel =“ nofollow noopeNer” target =“ _ _ _ brambs href =“ https://www.amazon.com/anthropologists-ayseg%c3%Bcl-savas/dp/163973306x” rel =“ nofollow noopener” target =“ _ black”>人类学家。故事集，“ Div> rss： https://feedx.net https://feedx.site
